addOrUpdateContact(extended).description: Adds or updates a contact (extended version)

props.name: matchExisting
props.description: If "Yes", will try to find an existing record using Email and Full Name and update it.

props.name: overrideLists
props.description: If "Yes", will override lists of contact details in update mode instead of merging them - lists, tags, emails, phones, links, addresses, photos.

props.name: ignoreInvalidValues
props.description: If "Yes", will save the record even if there are some validation errors.

props.name: contactId
props.description: Sperse Contact ID. Will be used for looking a client

props.name: contactXref
props.description: This is string external reference that can be passed during creation and then if sent again it will update the record.

props.name: createUser
props.description: If "Yes" then User will be created. Personal email will be used as User Name.

props.name: sendWelcomeEmail
props.description: If "Yes" then Welcome Email will be sent to the newly created user.

props.name: userPassword
props.description: If password is not passed then it will be automatically generated.

props.name: namePrefix
props.description: The title used to address the contact.

props.name: firstName
props.description: Required if Last Name and Company Name fields are empty.

props.name: middleName
props.description: The contact's middle name.

props.name: lastName
props.description: Required if First Name and Company Name fields are empty.

props.name: nickName
props.description: The contact's nick name.

props.name: nameSuffix
props.description: Additional information about the contact e.g PhD.

props.name: dob
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY.

props.name: bankCode
props.description: The contact's 4-letter personality code.

props.name: ssn
props.description: The contact's social security number.

props.name: isActiveMilitaryDuty
props.description: Possible values are: Yes, No. If nothing is chosen that means "Unknown".

props.name: isUSCitizen
props.description: Possible values are: Yes, No. If nothing is chosen that means "Unknown".

props.name: preferredToD
props.description: Preferred Time of Day to contact with Client

props.name: personAffiliateCode
props.description: Affiliate Code is used for the current person detection as a source of new leads. Alphanumeric characters, underscore and hyphen are allowed.

props.name: email1
props.description: The contact's personal email.

props.name: email2
props.description: The contact's alternative personal email.

props.name: email3
props.description: The contact's additional email.

props.name: workEmail1
props.description: The contact's work email.

props.name: workEmail2
props.description: The contact's alternative work email.

props.name: workEmail3
props.description: The contact's other work email.

props.name: mobilePhone
props.description: The contact's primary phone number.

props.name: mobilePhoneExt
props.description: The contact's primary phone number extension.

props.name: homePhone
props.description: The contact's home phone number.

props.name: homePhoneExt
props.description: The contact's home phone number extension.

props.name: workPhone1
props.description: The contact's work phone number.

props.name: workPhone1Ext
props.description: The contact's work phone number extension.

props.name: workPhone2
props.description: The contact's alternative work phone number.

props.name: workPhone2Ext
props.description: The contact's alternative work phone number extension.

props.name: home_street
props.description: The contact's full street address (can include apartment or unit number).

props.name: home_city
props.description: The contact's city of residence.

props.name: home_stateName
props.description: The contact's state of residence.

props.name: home_stateId
props.description: The contact's state code.

props.name: home_zip
props.description: The contact's zip/postal code.

props.name: home_countryName
props.description: The contact's country of residence.

props.name: home_countryId
props.description: The contact's country code.

props.name: work_street
props.description: The contact's work address.

props.name: work_city
props.description: The contact's work city.

props.name: work_stateName
props.description: The contact's work state.

props.name: work_stateId
props.description: The contact's work state code.

props.name: work_zip
props.description: The contact's work zip code.

props.name: work_countryName
props.description: The contact's work country.

props.name: work_countryId
props.description: The contact's work country code.

props.name: webSiteUrl
props.description: The contact's company website URL.

props.name: linkedInUrl
props.description: The contact's LinkedIn profile id.

props.name: photoUrl
props.description: The contact's person photo URL.

props.name: facebookUrl
props.description: The contact's Facebook profile id.

props.name: instagramUrl
props.description: The contact's Instagram profile id.

props.name: twitterUrl
props.description: The contact's Twitter profile id.

props.name: googlePlusUrl
props.description: The contact's Google reviews.

props.name: angelListUrl
props.description: The contact's AngelList profile id.

props.name: zoomUrl
props.description: The contact's Zoom id.

props.name: experience
props.description: The contact's professional experience.

props.name: profileSummary
props.description: The contact's profile summary.

props.name: notes
props.description: Additional notes about the contact

props.name: followUpDate
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. If date is defined then new Follow Up Task will be created for this contact

props.name: assignedUser
props.description: Preferably, Sperse User Email should be passed as it is unique within Sperse account but User Name can be also passed

props.name: leadDealAmount
props.description: Estimated deal/opportunity amount.

props.name: customField1
props.description: Additional custom data for the contact record.

props.name: companyName
props.description: Name of the contact's company (This field is mandatory if the First Name and Last Name fields are empty).

props.name: isEmployed
props.description: Pass yes if the client is employed in this Organization.

props.name: jobTitle
props.description: The contact's job title.

props.name: employmentStartDate
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY

props.name: dateFounded
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD or MM-DD-YYYY

props.name: industry
props.description: The company's industry.

props.name: leadSource
props.description: The first known source the contact used to find your website. You can set this automatically and update manually later.

props.name: channelId
props.description: The channel/medium the contact used to find your website.

props.name: affiliateCode
props.description: The affiliate/referer partner through which the contact signed up.

props.name: refererURL
props.description: The webpage where the contact clicked a link that sent them to your website.

props.name: dateCreated
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

props.name: entryUrl
props.description: The first page of visit through which the contact visited your website.

props.name: leadStageName
props.description: The first page of visit through which the contact visited your website.

props.name: star
props.description: String Value. Supports the following items: Yellow, Blue, Green, Purple, Red. Other values will be skipped.

props.name: rating
props.description: This is the static array from 1 to 10

props.name: sub1_productCode
props.description: Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

props.name: sub1_paymentPeriodType
props.description: The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

props.name: sub1_systemType
props.description: Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

props.name: sub1_code
props.description: Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 1.

props.name: sub1_level
props.description: Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

props.name: sub1_startDate
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

props.name: sub1_endDate
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

props.name: sub2_productCode
props.description: Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

props.name: sub2_paymentPeriodType
props.description: The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

props.name: sub2_systemType
props.description: Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

props.name: sub2_code
props.description: Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 2.

props.name: sub2_level
props.description: Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

props.name: sub2_startDate
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

props.name: sub2_endDate
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

props.name: sub3_productCode
props.description: Product Code from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

props.name: sub3_paymentPeriodType
props.description: The chosen Period Type has to be set for the Product on Sperse side

props.name: sub3_systemType
props.description: Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

props.name: sub3_code
props.description: Code of subscription service from the Sperse CRM. Either Product Code and Payment Period Type or System Type and Code are required fields within Subscription 3.

props.name: sub3_level
props.description: Code of subscription service level from the Sperse CRM.

props.name: sub3_startDate
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

props.name: sub3_endDate
props.description: Valid date format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

createInvoice.description: Creates a new invoice in the CRM.

props.name: contactId
props.description: Sperse Contact ID. Will be used for looking a client

props.name: contactXref
props.description: External Contact Reference (ID) . Will be used for looking a client

props.name: date
props.description: should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

props.name: dueDate
props.description: should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

props.name: productCode
props.description: Product Code. We will look up the product

props.name: transactionDate
props.description: should be like this: 2024-06-11T11:11:41Z

props.name: historicalData
props.description: Pass true if this is not actual transaction. Should be False by default

createProduct.description: Creates a new product in the CRM

props.name: code
props.description: Sku is the product code

props.name: descriptionHTML
props.description: Javascript and media tags are not allowed

props.name: price
props.description: Required for General , Digital and Event Product Type

props.name: unit
props.description: Required for General and Digital Product Type

props.name: frequency
props.description: Required for General and Digital Product Type

props.name: cycles
props.description: Required for all except LifeTime or OneTime plan

props.name: signupFee
props.description: Required for all except LifeTime or OneTime plan

props.name: customPeriodType
props.description: Required for Custom or OneTime Plan

props.name: customPeriodCount
props.description: Required for Custom or OneTime Plan

props.name: trialDayCount
props.description: Required for OneTime plan

props.name: userId
props.description: Id of the logged in user (not contact id)

props.name: userEmail
props.description: Email of the logged in user

new_lead.description: Triggers when a new lead is created

new_payment.description: Triggers when a new payment is created

new_subscription.description: Triggers when a new subscription is created
